Topic.Title: Any resolution to the inability to save games soon?

Posts.EditableText: I've noticed that there's been a problem saving games for a while now. Will this be fixed anytime soon? I've tried saving in my own game, as well as many others, and saving games always fails with the save command. I use chrome, but haven't yet tried with other browsers.
